org.ndacm.acmgroup.cnp.network.events

Interface TaskEventSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseNetwork, ClientNetwork, ServerNetwork

    public interface TaskEventSource
    This interface will allow for firing "TaskReceived" events. Other objects can also register listeners for the objects implementing this interface to receive those events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTaskReceivedEventListener(TaskReceivedEventListener listener) 
      void fireTaskReceivedEvent(TaskReceivedEvent evt) 
      void removeTaskReceivedEventListener(TaskReceivedEventListener listener) 

    • Method Detail

      • addTaskReceivedEventListener

        void addTaskReceivedEventListener(TaskReceivedEventListener listener)
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be attached.

      • removeTaskReceivedEventListener

        void removeTaskReceivedEventListener(TaskReceivedEventListener listener)
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be removed

      • fireTaskReceivedEvent

        void fireTaskReceivedEvent(TaskReceivedEvent evt)
        Parameters:
        evt - This event will contain a CNPTask object, you can call getCNPTask to retrieve it.
